languages.text: Несколько часов варп-полета авгуры сообщали о странном объекте, следующем за кораблем Вольного Торговца. Судя по искаженной телеметрии, за судном двигался корабль причудливой формы, напоминающей ксеносскую. Неизвестный преследователь несколько раз шел на сближение, во время которых авгуры передавали данные о переливающихся энергетических парусах, мелькавших среди варп-течений. Странная гонка закончилась исчезновением таинственного корабля в пучине Моря Душ.

During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.
languages.original_text: Несколько часов варп-полета авгуры сообщали о странном объекте, следующем за кораблем Вольного Торговца. Судя по искаженной телеметрии, за судном двигался корабль причудливой формы, напоминающей ксеносскую. Неизвестный преследователь несколько раз шел на сближение, во время которых авгуры передавали данные о переливающихся энергетических парусах, мелькавших среди варп-течений. Странная гонка закончилась исчезновением таинственного корабля в пучине Моря Душ.

traits.locale_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that followed the Rogue Trader's voidship over the course of several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.

languages.text: 亚空间航行期间，俄歇矩阵探测到了某个奇怪的物体，已经跟着行商浪人的虚空舰好几个小时了。根据失真的遥测数据判断，那是一艘奇形怪状的异形飞船。这位身份不明的追踪者曾多次试图接近虚空舰，俄歇矩阵甚至观察到它展开的能量帆在亚空间之流中闪闪发光。随后，那艘神秘的船消失在了灵魂之海深处，这场古怪的追逐也便结束了。
languages.original_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间航行期间，俄歇矩阵探测到了某个奇怪的物体，已经跟着行商浪人的虚空舰好几个小时了。根据失真的遥测数据判断，那是一艘奇形怪状的异形飞船。这位身份不明的追踪者曾多次试图接近虚空舰，俄歇矩阵甚至观察到它展开的能量帆在亚空间之流中闪闪发光。随后，那艘神秘的船消失在了灵魂之海深处，这场古怪的追逐也便结束了。

languages.text: Durante el viaje por la disformidad, los augures descubrieron un extraño objeto que llevaba varias horas siguiendo a la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. A juzgar por la telemetría distorsionada, se trataba de una nave de origen xeno con una forma extraña. El perseguidor no identificado intentó acercarse a la nave del vacío varias veces, lo que permitió a los augures observar las brillantes velas de energía desplegadas entre las cambiantes corrientes de la disformidad. La extraña persecución terminó cuando la misteriosa nave desapareció en las profundidades del Mar de Almas.
languages.original_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: Durante el viaje por la disformidad, los augures descubrieron un extraño objeto que llevaba varias horas siguiendo a la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. A juzgar por la telemetría distorsionada, se trataba de una nave de origen xeno con una forma extraña. El perseguidor no identificado intentó acercarse a la nave del vacío varias veces, lo que permitió a los augures observar las brillantes velas de energía desplegadas entre las cambiantes corrientes de la disformidad. La extraña persecución terminó cuando la misteriosa nave desapareció en las profundidades del Mar de las Almas.

languages.text: <歪み>を渡る中で、自由開拓者のヴォイドシップを数時間つけていた奇妙な物体をスキャナーが発見する。<歪み>遠隔測定器から判断して、あれは異種族発の異様な形をした船のようだ。正体不明の追跡者は、何度かヴォイドシップに近づこうとして、その度に移り変わる<歪み>の流れの中で、きらめくエネルギーの帆を張っている様子をスキャナーが観測できた。不思議なその船が魂の海の奥底へと消えて、奇妙な追いかけっこは終わりを告げる。
languages.original_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>を渡る中で、自由開拓者のヴォイドシップを数時間つけていた奇妙な物体をスキャナーが発見する。<歪み>遠隔測定器から判断して、あれは異種族発の異様な形をした船のようだ。正体不明の追跡者は、何度かヴォイドシップに近づこうとして、その度に移り変わる<歪み>の流れの中で、きらめくエネルギーの帆を張っている様子をスキャナーが観測できた。不思議なその船が魂の海の奥底へと消えて、奇妙な追いかけっこは終わりを告げる。

languages.text: Pendant le trajet dans le Warp, les augures découvrent qu'un étrange objet suit le vaisseau du {mf|libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pendant plusieurs heures. À en juger par les données télémétriques distordues, il s'agirait d'un vaisseau d'origine xénos à la forme surprenante. Le poursuivant inconnu tente de s'approcher du vaisseau à plusieurs reprises, ce qui permet aux augures d'observer de plus près les voiles d'énergie scintillantes déployées pour traverser les courants imprévisibles du Warp. Soudain le mystérieux vaisseau se volatilise dans les profondeurs de la Mer des Âmes et la poursuite prend fin.
languages.original_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: Pendant le trajet dans le Warp, les augures découvrent qu'un étrange objet suit le vaisseau du {mf|libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pendant plusieurs heures. À en juger par les données télémétriques distordues, il s'agirait d'un vaisseau d'origine xénos à la forme surprenante. Le poursuivant inconnu tente de s'approcher du vaisseau à plusieurs reprises, ce qui permet aux augures d'observer de plus près les voiles d'énergie scintillantes déployées pour traverser les courants imprévisibles du Warp. Soudain le mystérieux vaisseau se volatilise dans les profondeurs de la Mer des Âmes et la poursuite prend fin.

languages.text: Während der Warpreise entdeckten die Auguren ein merkwürdiges Objekt, das dem Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} schon seit mehreren Stunden gefolgt war. Der verzerrten Telemetrie nach zu urteilen, handelte es sich um ein merkwürdig geformtes Xenoschiff. Die unbekannten Verfolger versuchten mehrfach, sich dem Raumschiff zu nähern, wobei die Auguren die glänzenden Energiesegel sehen konnten, die in den Strömungen des Warps flatterten. Die merkwürdige Verfolgungsjagd endete, als das mysteriöse Schiff in den Tiefen des Meers der Seelen verschwand.
languages.original_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.

languages.text: Öteboyut yolculuğu sırasında alametler; Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisini birkaç saattir takip eden, garip bir nesne tespit etti. Bozulmuş telemetri verilerine bakılırsa bu; tuhaf bir şekle sahip, zeno kökenli bir gemiye benziyordu. Tanımlanamayan takipçi, uçsuz gemisine birkaç kez yaklaşmaya çalıştı. Bu sırada alametler; öteboyutun değişken akıntılarının içinde açılmış, parıldayan enerji yelkenlerini gözlemleme fırsatı buldu. Tuhaf takip, gizemli geminin Ruhlar Denizi'nin derinliklerinde kaybolmasıyla sona erdi.
languages.original_text: During the warp journey, the augurs discovered a strange object that had been following the Rogue Trader's voidship for several hours. Judging by the distorted telemetry, it was a strangely shaped vessel of xeno-origin. The unidentified pursuer tried to approach the voidship several times, allowing the augurs to observe the shimmering energy sails unfurled among the shifting currents of the warp. The strange chase ended after the mysterious ship vanished in the depths of the Sea of Souls.
